product_description: A slight wedge heel adds a hint of sophistication to a lightweight flip-flop featuring a contoured footbed and traction-enhancing sole.
product_details_and_care:
A slight wedge heel adds a hint of sophistication to a lightweight flip-flop featuring a contoured footbed and traction-enhancing sole.
1 1/2" heel (size 9)
Contoured footbed
Traction-pod outsole for enhanced grip and durability
Leather upper and lining/rubber sole
Imported

product_size_info: Whole sizes only; for 1/2 sizes, order next size up.
